project.title: DOGESTARTER
project.short_description: An open-source node.js Dogecoin crowdfunding app by the team behind DUELYST and powered by DogeAPI.

tiers.name: Supporter Shibe
tiers.description: Help us develop a better open source platform for community projects. Wow!

tiers.name: Honored Doge
tiers.description: Get your name in the credits as an early supporter of DOGESTARTER!

faq.question: Who made this?
faq.answer: Emil Anticevic with the team behind DUELYST.

faq.question: Why did you make it?
faq.answer: Mostly for LOLZ, but also because cryptocurrency crowdfunding should be a thing. We used Kickstarter to sucessfully crowdfund our project, and wanted to give back to the community.

faq.question: How should I support this?
faq.answer: You can Pledge or you can support DUELYST.

notifications.subject: Thank you for your DOGECOIN Pledge
